```yaml
---
name: "Agent Task"
about: "Use this template to create a task for a specialist agent."
title: "[agent] / SHORT-TITLE"
labels: "agent-task"
assignees: ""
---

## Summary
Describe the task and desired outcome.

## Agent
Name the agent to assign (IngestorAgent, NormalizerAgent, AnalyzerAgent, FrontendAgent, QAAgent, DevOpsAgent, DocsAgent)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Unit tests included and passing.
- [ ] E2E tests or demo script included if relevant.
- [ ] Screenshots (UI) included for any UI work: path `.test-results/screenshots/<issue-number>/`
- [ ] PR contains "How to run locally" section.

## Inputs
List any inputs, e.g., sample symbols, sample raw JSON, designs.

## Outputs
List expected outputs: file paths, tests, screenshots, demo commands.

## Notes
Any constraints, external links, or extra instructions.
```
